text: (ai rasool) tum (unase) kah do ki (tum ko ekhatiyaar hai) khvaah use allaah (kahakar) pukaaro ya rahamaan kah kar pukaaro (garaz) jis naam ko bhee pukaaro usake to sab naam achchhe (se achchhe) hain aur (ai rasool) na to apanee namaaz bahut chilla kar padho na aur na bilkul chupake se balki usake daramiyaan ek ausat tareeka ekhteyaar kar lo
